attributes.action: Cap the pricing imposed by private companies on London Underground Station Car Parks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that all London Underground station carparks are run by private companies can the Government not impose the capping of fees to stop the unfair high pricing of the system. These prices are not uniform and differ from station to station. Underground fares increase yearly and it is unfair for commuters and passengers alike to be unfairly charged again to park there car to use public transport which the Government champion as a preferred mode of transport.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor's office / Transport for London.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
